sentences.en: ...a suburban Boston neighbourhood close to where I live.
sentences.cn: …离我住处较近的波士顿城郊。

sentences.en: a highly respectable neighbourhood
sentences.cn: 非常体面的社区

sentences.en: a very affluent neighbourhood
sentences.cn: 富人区

sentences.en: Be quiet! You’ll wake up the whole neighbourhood!
sentences.cn: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

sentences.en: Councillors say plastic-framed windows lower the tone of the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 市政会委员说塑料框架的窗户让这个社区掉份儿了。

sentences.en: drug dealers terrorizing the neighbourhood
sentences.cn: 使附近地区人心惶惶的毒品贩子

sentences.en: He was born and grew up in the Flatbush neighbourhood of Brooklyn.
sentences.cn: 他出生在布鲁克林的弗拉特布什一带，并在那儿长大成人。

sentences.en: He's won in the neighbourhood of four million dollars.
sentences.cn: 他已经赢了约400万美元。

sentences.en: In the larger neighbourhood, I felt very unsafe.
sentences.cn: 在大一点的小区里，我感到很不安全。

sentences.en: Is there a good Chinese restaurant in the neighbor­hood?
sentences.cn: 这附近有没有好的中餐馆？

sentences.en: Its speed is probably in the neighbourhood of 380mph or even more.
sentences.cn: 它的时速大约达到了380英里，或者更快。

sentences.en: Nobody else in the neighbourhood can help.
sentences.cn: 邻居中找不到谁还能帮忙。

sentences.en: She doesn't seem cut out for this tough neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 她似乎不适合在这个治安恶劣的社区生活。

sentences.en: She grew up in a quiet neighborhood of Boston.
sentences.cn: 她是在波士顿一个清静的街区里长大的。

sentences.en: She is a good aunt to all the children in the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 她是街坊上所有孩子的好阿姨.

sentences.en: The boy wandered the neighbourhood, looking for his dog.
sentences.cn: 那男孩在附近徘徊, 寻找自己的狗.

sentences.en: the cost would be in the neighbourhood of three billion.
sentences.cn: 成本大约为30亿。

sentences.en: The hotel is situated in a peaceful residential neighbourhood (= area where there are houses rather than factories or shops ).
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆坐落在一个宁静的住宅区里。

sentences.en: The neighbourhood really is going to pot.
sentences.cn: 这个街区确实在走向败落。

sentences.en: These dreadful people bring down the tone of the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 这些讨厌的人败坏了这一地带的风气.

sentences.en: We grew up in the same neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 我们是在同一条街上长大的。

words.tran_cn: 睦邻的；友好的；邻居似的
像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）
邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带

trans.tran_en: an area of a town or city
